p: Fig. 6 shows the plot of predictions for COVID-19 confirmed cases in India. Fig. 7 shows the plot of predictions for COVID-19 deaths in India. India enforced nationwide lockdowns in several phases following the order issued on March 24, [42]. COVID-19 predictions for cases indicate cumulative cases are still increasing, which is also a trend indicated by the actual cases. Predictions on deaths indicate a flattening trend. The trends show that stronger mitigation measures need to be enforced to reduce infections.
